user_segments.name: Weekend Ski Warriors
user_segments.psychographic: Skis 3-8 times per season, values looking good in photos as much as performance, shops online first, influenced by social proof
pain_points: Can't justify $500+ for a jacket worn less than 10 days per year
Farm Rio sizing is a nightmare - reviewers say size down 2 sizes, but that's a gamble for $539
Tired of choosing between Instagram-worthy style OR actual warmth on the slopes
Most 'cute' puffers are just fashion pieces that fail at 20°F
user_segments.transformation_desire: From sacrificing style OR warmth to having BOTH without the luxury price tag or sizing anxiety

user_segments.name: Budget-Conscious Outdoor Moms
user_segments.psychographic: Needs versatile outerwear for school pickups, weekend trips, and outdoor activities. Sizing changed post-kids. Prioritizes value and practicality
pain_points: Body changed after kids - don't know true size anymore, can't risk $539 on Farm Rio's inconsistent sizing
Need something that works for cold morning soccer games AND looks good for family photos at ski lodge
Most affordable puffers look cheap or pill after one season
Luxury brands assume everyone can drop $500+ on seasonal outerwear
user_segments.transformation_desire: From expensive sizing mistakes and cheap-looking alternatives to confident, affordable style that actually performs

user_segments.name: First-Time Ski Trip Newbies
user_segments.psychographic: Going on first ski trip with friends/partner. Doesn't own ski gear. Wants to look good but doesn't know if they'll ski again
pain_points: $539 for Farm Rio feels insane for a 'maybe' hobby
Don't know enough about ski jackets to invest in expensive technical gear
Rental gear looks terrible in photos - need something Instagram-ready
Afraid to buy online because don't understand sizing for puffer jackets
user_segments.transformation_desire: From overwhelmed first-timer to confident, well-dressed skier without breaking the bank on unknown hobby

primary_segment.name: Weekend Ski Warriors
primary_segment.why: Largest addressable market - casual skiers who value style+performance but won't pay luxury prices

competitor_analysis.primary_competitor: Farm Rio Macaw Blue Puffer Jacket

fatal_flaws.evidence: Multiple reviews state 'size down 2 sizes' - one reviewer wearing size 4/6 bought XXS
fatal_flaws.harm: Customers gambling $539 on which size to order, high return rates, no confidence in online ordering
fatal_flaws.quote: Runs VERY large...I'm a size 4/6 and bought an XXS

fatal_flaws.evidence: 100% polyester, no technical insulation specs, designed for Rio de Janeiro brand
fatal_flaws.harm: Fails in actual cold weather, pills quickly, no moisture management
fatal_flaws.quote: Beautiful but not warm enough for real skiing

fatal_flaws.evidence: $539 for a polyester puffer with no technical features
fatal_flaws.harm: Luxury price for fashion-only piece, not accessible to average skier
fatal_flaws.quote: Gorgeous but can't justify $500+ for something I'll wear 5 times

fatal_flaws.evidence: Cheap polyester traps heat/moisture, no ventilation system
fatal_flaws.harm: Sweat then freeze cycle, uncomfortable during activity, odor retention
fatal_flaws.quote: Looked cute but was sweating within 10 minutes, then freezing on the lift

proprietary_technologies.name: Arctic Breathe™ Technology
proprietary_technologies.benefit: Moisture-wicking inner layer + ventilation zones = warm without the sweat
proprietary_technologies.solves: Farm Rio's cheap polyester trap-heat problem

proprietary_technologies.name: ThermaFlex™ Insulation
proprietary_technologies.benefit: Synthetic fill that performs like down but works when wet, flexible movement
proprietary_technologies.solves: Farm Rio's fashion-only 'insulation' that fails below 30°F

proprietary_technologies.name: WindShield™ Outer Layer
proprietary_technologies.benefit: Water-resistant shell blocks wind chill without the crinkly sound
proprietary_technologies.solves: Looking good while actually being protected from elements

proprietary_technologies.name: SmartFit™ Sizing
proprietary_technologies.benefit: True-to-size design with size chart that actually works, adjustable cuffs/hem

old_way_problems: Drop $500+ on luxury brands that are fashion-first, function-last
Gamble on sizing with expensive return shipping
Sacrifice warmth for style OR style for warmth
Sweat in cheap polyester then freeze on the lift
Pills, fades, and looks worn after one season
new_way_solutions: Get both style AND performance for less than $20
True-to-size with size chart that actually works (SmartFit™)
Arctic Breathe™ keeps you warm without the sweat-freeze cycle
ThermaFlex™ insulation performs in real cold, not just for Instagram
Quality construction that lasts multiple seasons
transformation_framework.tagline: All The Style, All The Warmth, None Of The Luxury Price Tag

market_position: Premium performance at accessible pricing - the anti-Farm-Rio
competitive_advantages: True-to-size fit vs Farm Rio's sizing nightmare
Technical performance features vs fashion-only design
